lgp.core.environment.config

Class JsonConfigurationLoader

  • lgp.core.environment.config.JsonConfigurationLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentLoader<TComponent>, ConfigurationLoader, Module

    public class JsonConfigurationLoader
implements ConfigurationLoader

    An implementation of interface ConfigurationLoader that loads configuration from a JSON file.

    A builder is provided that should be primarily used when creating an instance through the Java API.

    NOTE: This implementation caches the results of loading configuration, because the loader is immutable - that is, once it is created it can not be altered to load configuration from an alternate location.

    This means that the we can cache the result of loading configuration because we don't want to get changes in configuration when it is loaded in different places throughout an LGP run (i.e. the result of calling JsonConfigurationLoader.load should be deterministic in the context of an LGP run.

    See Also:
    interface ConfigurationLoader, JsonConfigurationLoader.load

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonConfigurationLoader

        public JsonConfigurationLoader(java.lang.String filename)

        An implementation of interface ConfigurationLoader that loads configuration from a JSON file.

        A builder is provided that should be primarily used when creating an instance through the Java API.

        NOTE: This implementation caches the results of loading configuration, because the loader is immutable - that is, once it is created it can not be altered to load configuration from an alternate location.

        This means that the we can cache the result of loading configuration because we don't want to get changes in configuration when it is loaded in different places throughout an LGP run (i.e. the result of calling JsonConfigurationLoader.load should be deterministic in the context of an LGP run.

        Parameters:
        filename - JSON file to load configuration information from.
        See Also:
        interface ConfigurationLoader, JsonConfigurationLoader.load

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public Configuration load()

        Loads an instance of class Configuration by parsing the JSON file associated with this loader.

        Returns:
        A class Configuration object that represents the contents of the JSON file.
        Throws:
        - When the filename given to the loader is not valid.
        See Also:
        class Configuration

      • getInformation

        public ModuleInformation getInformation()

        Provides information about the module.
